Articles.Content:
So I was watching hoc gaming the other day and I see this utility vehicle on his "thats no moon base" series and it reminded me of a forklift with the forks out in front and some flippers as well but the forks didn't rise, so I decided to try and build one and i did. So ladies and kerbals I present to you the Stock Kerbal Forklift! dun dun dun...

:)Additional notes...

It can lift things!

I will be working on a newer and improved model

Controls:

drive w a s d (default)

raise fork 1

drive with raised fork 2

lower fork 3

drive with lowered fork 4 (do not need to do this upon launch)

translate 5

download link coming soon

And in an unrelated question are spoilers broken or am I not typing them right?

the forks when lowered

the forks when raised

in the middle raising (lowering it just drop like a lander)

Warnings!!!

you may experience difficulty re-docking with lowered forks, this is normal

brake very slowly with lowered forks or you risk snapping off the landing gear

you may fall on you side doing a sharp turn

haven't tested on any body other than Kerbin

have not tested max lifting weight

Edited May 6, 2013 by Penguinhero
